description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to expand the supply of skilled and employable workers by increasing access to quality and labor market relevant training programs.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Disbursement Linked Results Verification. Description :Undertaking of an annual DLR verification process,including through independent third party entities where required as reflected in the Project Operational Manual. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards. Description: Implementation of (a) the Project in accordance with the Environmental Due DiligenceGuidelines, and (b) the SSDP in accordance with the Environmental and Social Management Framework. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Skills Sector Development Program. Description: Preparation and adoption, by no later than 3 months after theEffective Date, of a Skills Sector Development Program | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Inter-Ministerial Sector Coordination Committee. Description: Preparation and adoption, by no later than 3months after the Effective Date, of a Project Operational Manual. Establishment, by nolater than 3 months after the Effective Date,of an Inter-Ministerial Sector Coordination Committee, which shall be maintained throughout the implementation of the Project |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Program Steering Committee. Description: Establishment, by no later than 3 months after the Effective Date, of aProgram Steering Committee, which shall be maintained throughout the implementation of the Project | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement: Skills Development Division. Description: Maintenance, throughout the implementation of the Project, of aSkills Development Division within MYASD | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: Completion rate of trainees enrolled in public institutions
Average earnings of TVET graduates relative to earnings of GCE-O level graduates
Number of trainees enrolled in public and private training institutions
Timely availability of reliable data on institutional and sector performance
Number of students benefiting from implementation of the ETA model
Industry Sector Skills Councils (ISSCs) or equivalent functional in priority sectors
Number of public institutions covered by performance based funding
Number of providers with NVQ 1-6 with QMS
Timely submission (by June 30th) of entity audit reports of MYSAD and participating agencies

baseline.value: Only 2 out of 9 entities had timely audit reports
